thread.section_title: HandmadePiece Art 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 HandmadePiece Art 的点评意见 | www.handmadepiece.com
thread.title: Flemming Jacobsen
thread.title_full: HandmadePiece Art 的点评人 Flemming Jacobsen

author: Flemming Jacobsen
title: Flemming Jacobsen
text:
My wife and I decided to buy three oil paintings, so we forwarded low resolution pictures and received an offer we accepted. Few weeks later we received by mail a snapshot of the three paintings and question if we would accept them. According to the attached snapshots the pictures seamed to be acceptable.
We had some problems with the Customs in DK, but again HandmadePiece Art became helpful and concerned all the way until we finally received the pictures by mail today. And the result was satisfying.
Rgds. Flemming DK
